# Commit Message Conventions

- Use the following format for commit messages:

  <type>(<scope>): <description>

  [optional body]

  [optional footer]

- Types include:
  - âœ¨ feat: New feature
  - ğŸ› fix: Bug fix
  - ğŸ“ docs: Documentation changes
  - ğŸ’„ style: Code style changes that don't affect behavior
  - â™»ï¸ refactor: Refactoring
  - âš¡ perf: Performance improvements
  - âœ… test: Adding or modifying tests
  - ğŸ“¦ build: Changes to build system or external dependencies
  - ğŸ‘· ci: Changes to CI configuration files and scripts
- Write clear, concise, and descriptive commit messages.
- Reference related issues or pull requests when relevant.
